pullRequest.title: Update Find in Files Package option
pullRequest.bodyText:
After some user testing, we determined it makes more sense to separate the Search in: Package Source option into two options: Package Source (/R, /src) and Package Tests (/tests).

This PR also updates the git grep command to override any global git configurations the user may have set up on their computer. This could've led to rstudio mis-parsing output received from the command.
It also removes .Rd from the Search in: R Common Source Files option based on feedback that the majority of users have these files autogenerated.

commit.message:
update `Search in` option to search Package Source or Package Test
- remove .Rd files from Common R Source Files option
override default configurations when running `git grep`
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/rstudio/rstudio into feature/update-package-choice

nodes.bodyText: Might be worth adding a comment indicating that we set these configuration options to override any potential user-defined options?
I would prefer "Package Sources" or "Package Source Files" as a label here. (@jmcphers do you have an opinion?)
